articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: ‘Virtually’ all Voice of America staff put on leave after Trump order - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Reporters Without Borders slammed the decision, saying it “threatens press freedom worldwide”.
articles.content:
Nearly all Voice of America (VOA) staff members have been placed on leave after United States President Donald Trump signed an executive order gutting the government-run news agency.
On Friday night… [+2877 chars]

articles.title: ‘The White Lotus’ Star Aimee Lou Wood Says The Giveaway She’s Not American Is Her Teeth - Deadline
articles.description: The British actress says her teeth are the giveaway that she's British.
articles.content: British actress Aimee Lou Wood, who stars in the third season of The White Lotus currently airing on HBO, says she may be able to pull off a perfect US accent, but nobody ever mistakes her for Americ… [+2188 chars]
